SG 553 nerf heavy handed. Been using it since CSGO came out. I get changing up meta and stuff but this game just makes people want to quit if they use anything other than the classic deagle, AK, AWP, and M4. There's no logic to weapon balance in this game other than protecting and shielding the classics.
